erlref.modulesummary: Interface for CGI request on graphs used by percept.

description.p: Interface for CGI request on graphs used by percept. The module exports two functions that are implementations for ESI callbacks used by the httpd server. See http://www.erlang.org//doc/apps/inets/index.html.

func.name: graph(SessionID, Env, Input) -> term()
func.fsummary: An ESI callback implementation used by the httpd server.

desc.p: An ESI callback implementation used by the httpd server.

func.name: activity(SessionID, Env, Input) -> term()
func.fsummary: An ESI callback implementation used by the httpd server.

desc.p: An ESI callback implementation used by the httpd server.
